profile.themeFreeNotice: Yu stap long Fri ‚Äî yusim kwik Sun/Moon sospet daunbilo. Apgreit bilong opim moa tim.

profile.followHint: Sapos ol i putim stori long 'Foloas' o 'Pablik', stori bilong ol bai kamap long Foloim feed bilong yu.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Sampela samting i rong long dispela seksen.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fowatim ol kol na teks i kam i go long fon o imel yu bin verifai. Ol kol/teks yu salim inap soim Chatforia namba bilong yu.

profile.forwardTextsToEmail: Fowatim teks i go long imel

profile.errQuietHours: Kwaet awa i mas stap namel long 0 na 23.

home.title: Hom
home.subheader: Salim wanpela mesis bilong statim chat.

press.title: Pres
press.contactLine: Sapos yu gat tok askim bilong media, raitim long
press.boilerplateBody: Chatforia em i praivasi-namba-wan mesinjing app we i mekim isi long toktok namel long ol lanwis. Ol mesis i gat end-to-end enkripson olgeta taim, na insait translesen i sapotim 100+ lanwis long real-taim. Yusas inap onim disapirin mesis, rit risip i opsenal, na sink namel long ol divais. iOS, Android na web i stap.
press.assetsSubtitle: Logo, skrinshot, na piksa bilong prodak.
press.scanTip: Long desktop? Scanim wantaim fon bilong kisim app.

careers.title: Wok
careers.intro: Mipela em liklik tim i wok long mekim wanpela praivit, globol mesenja. Sapos yu laik long enkripson, aksesibol na nais UX, raitim tok long mipela.
careers.openRoles: Ol wok i op: Injiniaring (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Prodak, Sapot.
careers.apply: Ol rot bilong apelae: Emailim resume/links long jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Long Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia em i sekur, multilinigual mesenja wantaim end-to-end enkripson, kwik translesen, na kol/vidio. Misin bilong mipela em isi: helpim ol manmeri long konek ‚Äî sef, praivit, na namel long ol lanwis.

values.privacy: <bold>Praivasi namba wan:</bold> E2E enkripson olgeta taim.
values.control: <bold>Kontrol:</bold> Disapirin mesis & rit risip em opsenal.
values.privacy_aria: Praivasi namba wan: E2E enkripson olgeta taim.
values.access_aria: Akses long olgeta: Otomatik transleit 100+ lanwis.
values.control_aria: Kontrol: Disapirin mesis na rit risip em opsenal.

about.howDescription: Ol mesis i enkrip long divais bilong yu pastaim bipo em i go aut. Translesen, bakap na divais sink i plan gut bilong mekim seva i lukim liklik tasol.

advertise.title: Advetais wantaim Chatforia
advertise.description: Tanim ol yusa i save yusim mesinjing wantaim gutpela ples bilong bren. Mipela givim ban√° spesis long hap i lukluk tru, sponsesip, na haus promos. Ol Premium yusa i no lukim ads.

adsense.withPubId: Nau mipela i ranim ads long Google AdSense. Sapos yu laik targetim mipela long Google Ads, yusim publisher ID {{pubId}} na askim long manes plesmen long ol unit daunbilo. Direct sponsesip i stap ‚Äî yusim fom.
adsense.noPubId: Nau mipela i ranim ads long Google AdSense. Direct sponsesip tu i stap ‚Äî yusim fom daunbilo.

advertise.noPlacements: Nogat plesmen i set yet. Putim ol long ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Planti taim yusa i stap long chat UI
why.brandSafe: Brand-sef fomat; respek long fesensi kap
why.sponsoredMoments: Sponso momens (olsem ‚ÄúStat a Chat‚Äù modal) i stap
why.deals: Direk dil o programatik long AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Tenkyu! Tok askim bilong yu i go pinis. Mipela bai bek kwiktaim.
form.missingRequired: Plis pulimapim nem, imel, na mesis.
form.successToast: Tenkyu! Mipela bai toktok wantaim yu bhain.
form.mailtoInfo: Bai opim imel klien bilong salim tok askim‚Ä¶

gettingStarted.title: Statim
gettingStarted.subtitle: Nupela long Chatforia? Dispela kwik stat bai soim ol as tingting na bai yu redi long yusim kwiktaim.

alert.text: Dispela gaid bai gro taim mipela i lansim nupela fea. Sapos wanpela samting i lus, tokim mipela long

section2.title: 2) Stat long mesinjing
section2.item1: Wokim DM o Grup na salim namba wan mesis.
section2.item2: Yusim kwik translesen bilong toktok namel long 100+ lanwis.
section2.item3: Traim disapirin mesis na rit risip long Profail ‚Üí Praivasi.

section3.title: 3) Go moa
section3.item1Part2: pes (Plus = nogat ads, Premium = full fea).
section3.item2Part1: Linkim moa divais na setim enkrip bakap long

account.q: Olsem wanem long wokim o kisim bek akaun?
account.a: Daunlodim app o yusim web, taip ‚ÄúWokim akaun‚Äù, verifaim imel/fon. Long kisim bek, yusim ‚ÄúFoget paswod‚Äù.

privacy.q: Ol mesis i gat end-to-end enkripson?
privacy.a: Yes. Ol mesis na kol i gat end-to-end enkripson olgeta taim. Yu tasol na man yu toktok long em inap ritim.

translate.q: Olsem wanem kwik translesen i wok?
translate.a: Onim ‚ÄúOtomatik transleit‚Äù long Seting ‚Üí Apirens & Lanwis. Taim i sapot, mipela mekim long divais; sapos nogat, yusim sekiua API wantaim liklik metadata tasol.

contact.a: Raitim long support@chatforia.com. Putim skrinshot na vesin bilong app bilong yu.

contact.title: Kontakim Mipela
contact.successMsg: Tenkyu ‚Äî tim bai bekim long imel.
contact.errorSend: Inap nogat long salim. Plis email support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Dispela Praivasi Polisi i eksplenim olsem wanem Chatforia (‚Äúmipela‚Äù, ‚Äúyumi‚Äù) i kisim, yusim, na serim infomesen taim yu yusim app na sevis bilong mipela. Mipela i planim Chatforia bilong mekim liklik tasol data mipela inap lukim.

infoWeCollect.title: Infomesen mipela i kisim
infoWeCollect.account: Akaun infomesen (olsem imel/fon) bilong wokim na seifim akaun.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Enkripim konten (mesis/kol) i gat end-to-end enkripson; mipela i no inap ritim.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Daignostik/yusis olsem kras log, kaen divais, o smol analis bilong mekim sevis i go gut.

howWeUse.title: Olsem wanem mipela i yusim infomesen
howWeUse.provide: Saplai na seifim sevis (auth, painim spem/pasin nogut).

sharing.title: Serim
sharing.body: Mipela i no salim personal data. Tasol sampela taim mipela inap serim liklik data wantaim ol prosesa (olsem pus notifikesen, analis) aninit long strongpela kontrak.

rights.title: Ol rait bilong yu
rights.body: Long sampela hap (olsem GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), yu inap askim long lukim, stretim, dilitim, o stopim sampela kain prosesis. Kontak: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Taim mipela i holim & sekuriti
retention.body: Mipela i holim tasol ol samting i nid tru bilong ranim sevis na yusim indastri-standet sekuriti. E2E konten ‚Äî mipela i no inap brekim enkripson.

children.title: Pikinini
children.body: Chatforia i no bilong pikinini aninit long 13 yia (o olsem lo bilong ples bilong yu i tok).

changes.title: Senis
changes.body: Mipela bai postim apdeit hia na senisim ‚ÄúLas apdeit‚Äù deit.

intro.body: Taim yu yusim Chatforia yu orait long ol dispela Tems. Sapos yu no orait, noken yusim sevis.

accounts.title: Akaun
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Saplai tru infomesen na lukautim ol paswod.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Yu i holim resposibiliti long wok bilong akaun bilong yu.

acceptableUse.title: Gudpela pasin bilong yus
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Noken putim pasin/tingting i brukim lo, nogut, o i brukim rait; nogat spem o otometed abuse.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Mipela inap sospend/terminet sapos yu brukim ol rul.

yourContent.title: Konten bilong yu
yourContent.body: Yu yet i gat rait long konten bilong yu. Yu givim mipela ol rait i nidim long ranim sevis (olsem rauting, stoa, translesen).

disclaimer.title: Disklama & laibiliti
disclaimer.body: Sevis i kam ‚Äúas is‚Äù na i no gat waranti. Long bikpela hap long lo i oraitim, Chatforia i no holim laibiliti long ol bagarap i go raun/daunstrim.

changes.title: Senis
changes.body: Mipela inap apdeitim ol dispela tems; taim yu go het long yus bihain long senis, em i minim yu orait.

doNotSell.title: Noken Salim o Serim Personal Infomesen bilong Mi
doNotSell.body: Chatforia i no salim personal infomesen. Ol residen bilong California inap yet long salim rekues aninit long CPRA wantaim batin daunbilo.

cookies.title: Kuki Seting
cookies.body: Chatforia i yusim smol kuki tasol (olsem sesen, sekuriti). Mipela i no yusim kakai-kukis bilong 3-pati ads. Manesim kuki long brausa seting.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Inap nogat long lodim status bilong namba.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Nogat namba yet. Makim wantaim eria kod na statim texting.

startChatModal.searchByUsernameOrPhone: Painim wantaim yusa nem o fon
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Taipim yusa nem o fon na presim Painim.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Ol fon/imel bai stap redi taim yu seivim ol olsem kontak.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Pundaun long statim chat wantaim ol yu makim.

sounds.freeNotice: Yu stap long Fri ‚Äî ol premium ton i so tasol i lok. Apgreit bilong opim olgeta.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Dispela fea i nidim Premium plan.

aiSettings.title: AI Seting
aiSettings.controlIntro: Kontrolim translesen, smart riplais, na ForiaBot otorepons.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Otomatik transleitim ol mesis i kam
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Salim ol las-fyu mesis (klian pinis) long AI bilong makim kwik bekim.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Maskim ol tok nogut long AI sapgestion
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Sapos on, ol sapgestion AI i givim bai maskim ol tok i bin flag
aiSettings.translateTagged: Taim tasol man i yusim @translated o tag

accessibilitySettings.title: Aksesibiliti & Alat
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Ol opsen bilong mekim Chatforia i isi long yusim maski yu no yusim saund.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Stat long normal sais. Kirapim sapos yu laik bikpela teks long aksesibiliti seting.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Visiol alat bilong mesis & kol
Soim bana na taitol i blink bai yu no lusim aktiviti.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Wibreit taim nupela mesis i kam (taim i sapot)
MeKim divais i wibreit wantaim nodifikesen.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Plasim skrin taim kol i kam
Sotpela lait i strong taim kol i ring.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Otomatik transkraibim vois not
Soim transkrip wantaim audio yu kisim.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Soim bana na taitol i blink bai yu no lusim aktiviti.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Wibreit taim nupela mesis i kam (sapos sapot)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Trigga divais i wibreit wantaim nodifikesen.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Plasim skrin taim kol i kam
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Sotpela lait taim kol i ring.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Stoa tasol saifatekis long seva. Em i disebilim AI/Transleit na modaresen preview.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Painim wantaim alias, nem, yusa nem, o fon

peoplePage.inviteDesc: Serim invite link bilong yu bilong statim chat kwik.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Stap klostu wantaim Chatforia long iOS na Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Tip: Ol mesis bai stap sink namel long web na mobail.

randomChat.title: Random Chat
randomChat.description: Painim kwik wanpela nupela pren. Mipela bai makim wanpela na opim wanpela taim-be chat rum.
randomChat.saveGuard: Chat namel long manmeri tasol inap seiv

login.title: Welkam bek
login.subtitle: Login long Chatforia akaun bilong yu
login.ssoUnavailable: SSO i no stap nau. Yusim yusa nem & paswod.

error.missing: Plis putim ol detel bilong login.
error.unprocessable: Rikues i no stret. Sekim yusa nem/imel na paswod.
error.deviceLimit: Divais limit i pulap long Fri plan. Logaut long narapela divais o apgreit i go Premium bilong linkim moa divais.
error.premiumRequired: Dispela aksen i nidim Premium plan.
